resources.string: This sample shows how to use the ACS library for Android
This flow demonstrates how to use the login control to obtain an access token used when validating authenticated users or consuming other services
This flow demonstrates how to secure an activity [view] with the AccessControlSecuredActivity class performing an automatic login process if the user is not logged previously
This view is secured using the AccessControlSecuredActivity as super class
{the namespace of the ACS service you are using}
